qa:testcase.qa:test-case-summary: Starts the session at Medigy's demo home page, searches for Claim and then clicks on the link that represents Claim's page.

qa:hu-page-validation.functionId: Successful arrival at Medigy's demo home page
qa:hu-page-validation.title: Welcome to Medigy
